card_text: 2 Level 4 monsters$NIf this card is Xyz Summoned: You can apply these effects, in sequence, based on the materials used. You can only use this effect of "Gunkan Suship Ikura-class Dreadnought" once per turn.$N●"Gunkan Suship Shari": Draw 1 card.$N●"Gunkan Suship Ikura": This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.$NOnce per turn, when your "Gunkan" monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.
